mapper.select: select boardId, b.accountId, categoryId, subject, object, youtubeLink, CONVERT_TZ(b.reg_date,'+09:00','+00:00') as reg_date, CONVERT_TZ(b.mod_date,'+09:00','+00:00') as mod_date, viewCount, (select count(*) from videocomment where b.boardId = boardId) as replyCount , ac.nickname, ac.footer, (select round(AVG(star),2) from videostar where b.boardId = boardId) as starCount from videoBoard b, accounts ac where boardId = #{boardId} and b.accountId = ac.accountId
mapper.insert: insert into videoBoard(accountId, categoryId, subject, object, youtubeLink, reg_date, mod_date) values(#{accountId}, #{categoryId}, #{subject}, #{object}, #{youtubeLink}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update videoBoard set subject = #{subject}, object = #{object}, youtubeLink = #{youtubeLink}, mod_date = now() where boardId = #{boardId}
UPDATE videoBoard SET viewCount = viewCount+1 WHERE boardId=#{boardId}
mapper.select: select EXISTS (select * from followlist where followAccountId = #{accountId2} and followerAccountId = #{accountId} )
select EXISTS (select star from videostar where accountId = #{accountId} and boardId = #{boardId} )
